pullrequest.title: Install sdf files in versioned folder to allow debs to install side-by-side

content.raw:
Corresponding PR in packaging [#!/osrf/sdformat8-release/pull-requests/3/support-for-side-by-side-installations-of/diff](#!/osrf/sdformat8-release/pull-requests/3/support-for-side-by-side-installations-of/diff).

We can discuss the tradeoffs of going with this modification for Blueprint. It’s very late in the release cycle but it could worth testing it if the benefits for users/developers is big.
